originalText.text: I had so much fun working with Lara!  I knew from our first phone conversation that she was the perfect person for me; kind, clear, talented and efficient.  When we went to look at the space she immediately went to work seeing past what the space looked like.  I don't think a week had passed before she was ready to go over everything.  She came prepared, having sifted through all my willy-nilly choices and found what was most appropriate.  Less than a week later I had plans in my e-mail box.  I can't wait for my next project with Lara.

text.text: I had so much fun working with Lara!  I knew from our first phone conversation that she was the perfect person for me; kind, clear, talented and efficient. originalText.text: Lara Apelian designed and executed installation of book shelves in my apartment. She did the drawings, ordered mill work and supervised installation.  It was a wonderful experience, all went according to schedule, and looked perfect.  Lara was always very responsive to my questions and comments and made changes quickly and efficiently.  I highly recommend her as a professional.

originalText.text: Supremely creative, professional and prompt.The scope of the work they do is not limited to just the design elements, they also handle all the bureaucracy involved in getting the appropriate permits, approvals and licenses needed.
